005360.KS.summary: Monami Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stationery products in South Korea and internationally. The company offers pens, pencil, markers, highlighters, and artist's materials, as well as miscellaneous, such as eraser, glue stick, white clean, correction tape, and white board cleaner. Monami Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Yongin-Si, South Korea.

071840.KS.summary: LOTTE Himart Co.,Ltd. primarily provides electronic products in South Korea and internationally. Its product categories include TVs, refrigerators, washers and dryers; Kitchen, Living, and Health Appliances; Seasonal household appliances; computers; digital, game, and sound products; cellphones; living and kitchen supplies; furniture and home decoration products; sports fashion and leisure products; office and stationery products; hobby, travel, and companion animal products; vehicle tools; toys and games; fashion products; and beauty products. It provides its products through specialty stores, as well as through Internet. LOTTE Himart Co.,Ltd. was formerly known as Hi-mart Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LOTTE Himart Co.,Ltd. in November 2012. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. LOTTE Himart Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Lotte Shopping Co., Ltd.
